entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow or rain mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 then light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
